name: 芮祥鵬
objective:
本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：
(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。
(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
schedule:
Chapter 1 Polymer Histry and Introduction         (1 wk)
Chapter 2 Polymer solution and conformation        (1 wk)
Chapter 3 Polymer solid physics                   (2 wk)
Chapter 4   Polymer Thermal Property (2 wks)
Chapter 5-Viscosity (2 wks)
Mid-term Exam
Chapter 6 Polymer Processing (1 wk)
Chapter 6 (b) Extrusion and Compounding (1 wk)
Chapter7 Composite Materials (1 wk)
Chapter 9 Fracture Mechanics (1 wk)
Chapter 10 Special topic on polymer blend & compounding (1 wk)
Chapter 13 Rubber Elasticity (1 wk)
Final Reports
materials:
Principles of Polymer Systems (fifth edition)
    (Ferdinand Rodrigues)
